General.Name: Liberty Energy Corp
General.Description: Liberty Energy Corp. engages in the exploration and development of oil and gas properties in the United States. It holds interests in four oil and gas producing leases, which cover 1,038 acres with 17 oil wells and 4 injection wells located Baylor County, Texas. The company was formerly known as DMA Minerals Inc. and changed its name to Liberty Energy Corp. in June 2008. Liberty Energy Corp. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 2425 Fountain View Drive, Houston, TX, United States, 77057
